[b]Os problemas do jogo são: Spam de Lanterna e ficar agachando na frente do killer enquanto ele tá "tentando" enganchar alguém pq não consertaram esse glitch ainda e talvez nunca consertem ,o jogo não é + casual desde que implementaram o MMR mas é um jogo "até" que divertido com amigos pq tira toda aquela tensão e estresse(as vezes kkkk)

jogando de killer no inicio vc só vai se estressar até upar bem ele pq só vai cair com tryhard lvl 100 pra cima de sobrevivente q vai ficar usando habilidade OP e te bullynando com isso e outras coisas a partida inteira

já jogar de sobrevivente é + dboa ,e na maioria das vezes ,você vai cair com pro player de sobrevivente que vai rushar gerador com você

pra partida dar certo tem que ter alguém chamando a atenção do killer bullynando ele ou só fugindo msm a partida toda(ou quase toda) enquanto o resto dos sobreviventes rusham gerador ea partida acaba em 7min ;)

sobrevivente éo melhor modo na minha opinião pq o jogo é + fácil pra vc(tirando o limite de enganchamentos e que você não pode se defender de forma agressiva)

só compre se estiver em promo pq vai valer + a pena[/b]

8/10 would 360 again

The game is well thought out, the 1v4 survival idea is amazing and it definitely gives the game an edge knowing you're going against another person, another player, not just a computer. So far I'm enjoying the game. Having come to PC from my Switch it's a bit of a learning curve but it still has controller compatibility so it's easy to transfer from console to PC if you don't wish to play on keyboard and mouse. 10/10 would definitely convert my friends so we can all play together.
Few bugs here and there, but overall a unique and interesting game as long as you know how not to get tilted

На первый взгляд игра может показаться классной - разнообразие персонажей и скинов, внутриигровая валюта, позволяющая не тратить свои деньги, игра с друзьями и выполнение заданий..НО! Когда адаптируешься и начинаешь понимать, как всё работает, то разочаровываешься. Вместо приятной игры получаешь боль и унижение, потому что разработчики не могут починить то, что на протяжении многих лет беспокоит игроков. Они не видят главного, вместо этого обращают внимание на второстепенное. Из-за чего наработанный скилл не имеет смысла в игре. Про комьюнити вообще молчу - токсичный вброс. Игра умирает. Самое страшное, что это всё затянуло и не собирается отпускать, как наркотик, если начал играть - закончить невозможно. Соболезную всем, кто потратил своё время и нервы на это. Не совершайте наших ошибок, лучше идите погуляйте!!!

This game is a grind and is no fun to play as long as "SBMM" is active. As of late I have been solo-queueing as survivior and the queue times are anywhere from 3-9 minutes even to find a lobby. Because I play both sides I can also see why no one is really playing killer anymore. Survivors now have access to "Boon: Circle of Healing" and this perks makes playing anyone that isnt plague frustrating and not fun. As killer I have been running into many games where all the survivors are running nothing but the same 4 perks and it causes me to work super hard just to even get 2 kills. By the end the of matches you really feel mentally drained and not wanting to play anymore. Therefore, as long as SBMM and Circle of Healing continues to be in the game, than my review will remain the same.
I lose brain cells every time I play

Cheating, 1/10 players are cheating, in top MMR 7/10 games have at least 1 cheaters, and BHVR refuse to do anything about it. Reports with video footage are sent in, nothing is done, streamers broad cast cheaters in the game with thousands watching, nothing is done, cheaters come in different sorts , there are crazy ones that just blatantly showed they are cheating ,while others use smal speed boost, autododge, instant unhook, fake lagging and less noticable methods. No penalty is dealt to them, so more people see that , more people starts to hack 
It is a great game, but it will die if nothing is done with hacking, many great games dead because of hacking, i see no difference with this one

Dead By Daylight is a live service game, that alone will either a neutral meh or a loud groan from anyone reading this.
A lot of my frustration comes from this game being 5 years old now and refusing to shirk a lot of their growing pains, a lot of my experience comes from playing killer and not so much survivor.
See, what's meant to happen is that dead by daylight is an aysmmetric horror game, where 4 characters are meant to hide from a killer and try and escape.
Here's what actually happens:
You get in a game with 4 people who are either SWFs or carrying flashlights, they all have the meta perks or are in the process of training up an alt to get said perks. They will all try to bodyblock you.
The issue with DBD is that a LOT of the game is in dire need of a rebalance or rework because a lot of the game has become stale and stratified.
As a direct consequence: A lot of the new content that comes out now is judged solely by "how well does it interact with the current state of survivors".
This game is currently in a bad forme and needs serious care from the dev team to be worth your money, avoid for now.
I have fun, even tho it's absolutely infuriating sometimes.
现在的屠夫难度远大于人类，不推荐新玩家去玩屠夫
Имбовая игра
Очень интересная игра, с двумя ролями, где ты можешь стать безжалостным маньяком или выносливым сурвом. Умение командно играть, поможет вам выжить и открыть ворота.

So.. this game is pretty divisive. Overall, the gameplay has its limitations and the occasional imbalances, but the loop is generally quite simple and fun, good variety between killers and survivors and it does a lot lore-wise for the average horror nerd - there's not much else out there currently like it.
The community gets a lot of grief, and yes, there are too many nasty/selfish/dickish players there, but in 50+ hours I must say I've experienced more positive interactions and demonstrations of good sportsmanship than the bad (killer letting last survivor escape if one disconnects, etc) Chat randos even dish out a gg about 30% of the time. Admittedly, it's a much stronger experience if you have at least 1 friend in party. 
Don't take the game too seriously (ignore those who do), and don't go in to ruin someone's day (DO NOT CAMP), and you'll have a lot of fun with this. Until something a bit more polished and tightly moderated comes along :)
You will hate this game, you will like this game, you will play this game. I recommend playing this with friends because it will be more fun. 7/10
The only amazing thing in this game is the lack of balance

Granted not as many hours as some but here goes...

I heavily do not recommend this game if you plan to play killer, its just pure hell, the co-ordination from the survivors when they are in a 4 man team (SWF) is just too stressful to beat, sure it can be done, but it will be a sweat fest on your side and exhausting to play.

That on top of the fact that naturally in an asymmetrical game its a 4v1 the survivor side has many more consistent players as you get to play with your friends, so the voice of the survivors is louder then the voice of the killer, the killer mains keep getting nerfed on certain things because survivor mains keep complaining when they loose or die, from what i understand the game as at a point now where Que times are super long for survivors because a lot of the Killer mains have just walked away from the game.

The game is also very very very toxic, not always with post game chats but even just the actions of the players during game, each side complains about the other, survivors call tunnelling and camping and killers get flashlight spammed, body blocked, denied hooks, denied downs and games taken hostage to name a few

if you are planning on playing survivor alone or with your friends and this all sounds like fun then go ahead, but que times will be longer the more people just play survivor and no one wants to play killer cos its too miserable soo...

This Game is unbalanced, like REALY UNBALANCED. When you want to play this Game as survivor go for it. But if you want to play this Game as killer, please dont buy it and just give the 20$ to an homeless person or burn it, everythink, but dont buy it. 
Killer are more or less just complitly underpowerd. I mean, its not impossible to win, but stupid hard. And the best part of playing killer is the constant salt and toxic behavior from EVERY survivor. Every match teabaging if one survive, if you smack them, insults in the after match chat. You as killer are not allowed to use good Perks like Noed or Ruin, but survivors are allowed to use stupid good Perks like DS, Dead Hard, unbreakable and Boon: Circle of Healing

Please, leave the game for good
